title: The Were, The Witch and The Baby
description: He was an animal in the sack…Lyric McAvoy, witch, never expected that her one night stand with the irresistible Colin would result in a child. She agrees to stay with him to hide from the repercussions family and friends are sure to rain down on her. But staying with him only reminds her of the desire he awakened with just a touch on the dance floor.She cast a spell on his senses…Colin, packleader of the local werewolves, trusts his instincts. But when Lyric sweeps into his life, he can’t resist the urge to possess her. Though a pregnancy sounds impossible, he’s determined to protect her and the baby.War is breaking out in the paranormal world…Someone is trying to turn the previously peaceful inhabitants of the paranormal world into pawns in a deadly battle. With secrets keeping them apart, Colin and Lyric battle raging passion while trying to figure out who is killing their people.
author: Virginia Nelson
